caption: Fantastic porterhouse and very friendly service!

Recommended.The steak I got was very delicious as I expected. The whole meal was just not a 5 star experience. Steaks are cook to perfection. It was worth it for the price. I will come back next time.
The steaks were amazing and the drinks were great as well. Great vibe and good for people watching. Staff is always friendly, professional and fun.
The staff was very pleasant and very attentive to our needs while we were dining. Their service was so satisfying. If you love chicken wings then this restaurant is perfect for you!
godd steakhouse, good location, good service

We love hanging out. Yesterday we arrived in this delicious restaurant which we didn’t know before. We enjoyed a beautiful time there with first-rate meal and an efficient crew and a distinguished  cuisine. We  added this venue in our phone list  and we will surely go again very soon.  Highly recommended.

I was a little disappointed with my meal at Harris'. I had the Harris Steak and my wife had the Bone-in Ribeye. My wife really enjoyed her steak but the Harris Steak, although cooked perfectly medium rare, was too bland and not seared enough for my taste. The restaurant is nice and the staff is perfectly attentive but the meal fell a little short.
A new favorite when I visit the city.  Food was delicious and the staff were excellent and attentive.  I will definitetly be back
Best Steakhouse. Great food, great service.
It's worth every penny.

My Husband and I were in San Francisco for her birthday weekend. We wanted a traditional, elegant steakhouse. And that's exactly what we got. The steaks were great, but you would expect that. It was the whole evening. The appetizers were wonderful and the side dishes and desserts were delicious. The staff couldn't have been nicer and we had a wonderful evening.
I’m a good friend of the owner the way he treats his employees is absolutely phenomenal the staff here is top-of-the-line krejt food
Possibly the best steakhouse in NYC! Follow my Insta for more @keacherr
I like this restaurant a lot. theres a very special atmosphere. The meals are wonderful. the service is powerful and the waiters are friendly. The cost is satisfactory. deeply recommend.
Great steaks and less expensive than peers with similar quality like Peter Luger.
do not leave if it's busy, it is worth it. service is typically above par. it has a good feel to it. mood here reminds me of san diego's scene.
Senor frog waitress “Deja” is the best. Energetic and loads of fun. Food was awesome. Excellent atmosphere

Thank you so much! You made my first experience amazing. Very knowledgeable about the menu/wine. And gave some  amazing recommendations. Thank you again! I will be coming here over and over again. Amazing service!
I really enjoyed my half salad and sandwich. The portion size was perfect. I like that you got to choose which sandwich and salad you wanted.

We LOVED the food, service, and ambiance. The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had an unforgettable dining experience. Such a delicious romantic dinner here. Our server was on point & professional. Will definitely return- Highly recommended! Ps- don’t miss out on the thick cut bacon!
Nice steak house.

two days ago was our first time we visited this restaurant. But It is absolutely not the last time. We enjoyed the evening a lot with the generous service, with the fine  food and fine drinks and with the decent pay. We will surely visit there again.
Happy to see that even during COVID, the restaurant is still very high quality. Service is great as always and this will definitely be a place I'll continue to revisit.
great place to meet and catch up with friends. the place has an awesome feel to it.

I had a great day spending with your restaurant and eat delicious food. The waiters and the waitresses entertained me with a full of confidence, passion, and determination. As I waited for my order, I roamed my eyes in the place and found out that it was clean, cool, and has a modern style. Besides, the drinks and food that was served for me taste very good and yummy. Thanks for making my day splendid!
I get to eat here a lot since I work close by. I like how their customer service is always good and they keep the spot well kept consistently. Pricing is affordable and they serve big portions.
Great service and customer care. Very polite on the phone and very helpful.
Great food and service! Tomahawk steak is huge!

Great place. Nice staff. This place is always super busy and packed but you never have to wait. The staff are so good at what they do the lines are never a match for their lightning speed. All the food is fresh and the setting is always clean.

service is always awesome even when they have a full house. the service was helpful and kind. the place has an awesome feel to it.

Extraordinary compared to other steakhouse in New York serves a high quality and delightful steaks! Foods and beverages are well worth their prices. Small but quiet and very relaxing spot. Welcoming and attentive staffs gives the best service. Will definitely refer this place to my friends.

After just being proposed, this was the perfect anniversary/celebratory dinner. Staff were friendly, we had the giant crab and scallops to start which were amazing. Both had fillet mignon for main, the outside was a bit burnt so we ended up cutting that off and eating the middle as it ruined the taste of the steak. But we were enjoying the atmosphere so much we didn't make a complaint. Even brought us out a personalised anniversary desert, nice touch. If visiting NY again we will return.
Nice restaurant and tasty food..
Great restaurant, good meat, good fries, good wine and awesome service

I'll be giving my "5" stars all the way to this restaurant. It was a nice experience for me for the first time. They strive to provide us the best service that exceeds our expectations. The most reputable restaurant in my area. I would definitely recommend and refer your services to everyone without any hesitation as well.
I recommend to visit, delicious

Always loved coming here especially for cowboy ribeye steaks. However after going today I ordered a t-bone steak and it was not good. The meat seemed old and not the same aged steaks I've been used to in previous visits.  My friends who also dined with me also stated the steaks were dry, bland, and old.  I will unfortunately have to find another steakhouse that will maintain a juicy high quality steak that's worth the price advertised
Top notch steaks! A great place to eat downtown and near the South Street Seaport
My new 1st choice for steak. Service was great too.
Still great. Love the bacon!
Great food

NYC is loaded with great steak joints. This one just hit on all points. Seafood stack was great, so was the wine list for cabs. I'll be coming back because on top of everything else, my group of 8 clients didn't feel like being all stuffy as we just wanted to get rid of our stupid suits and eat after a long day of business meetings. It really is a good place "all in"
Incredible

(Translated by Google) I state that expectations were high given the reviews. I ordered smashed potatoes ($ 10) and bone-in cowboy ribeye ($ 62 + tax and tip) while for sweet brownie with ice cream (around $ 10). The meat I asked for medium-rare but in many places it literally got charred. The quality then left a lot to be desired with several nerves. The normal brownie. Clarification: if the restaurant aims to be a steakhouse (so at least says the name of the restaurant) why do I find a prevalence of fish and pasta on the menu? The same appetizers are practically all based on fish and it is not clear how you can first order a fish appetizer and then a nice steak. Findings far below expectations given the price.  (Original) Premetto che le aspettative erano alte viste le recensioni. Ho ordinato smashed potatoes (10$)  e bone-in cowboy ribeye (62 $ + tasse e mancia) mentre per dolce brownie con gelato (sui 10$). La carne l'avevo chiesto medium-rare ma in moltinpunti è arrivata letteralmente carbonizzata. La qualità poi lasciava molto a desiderare con parecchi nervi. Il brownie normale. Precisazione: se il ristorante punta ad essere una steakhouse (così almeno dice il nome stesso del locale) perché nel menù trovo una prevalenza di pesce e di pasta? Gli stessi antipasti sono praticamente tutti a base di pesce e non si capisce come si possa prima ordinare un antipasto a base di pesce e poi una bella bistecca. Giudizio ben al di sotto delle aspettative visto il prezzo.
Very good food especially the steak. Great long old fashioned bar.

One of the best steaks downtown.  Great value for your money.
Great food, outstanding service, and a beautiful place.

Always have an awesome dinner here. Very elegant place, and excellent service. A bit pricy, but on par with other steakhouses. We went on restaurant week and paid about $55pp for a solid portion of appetizer, dinner, and dessert.. Definitely need to try the Bacon!!
Old school steakhouse near the seaport. Good steaks and seafood with solid service in a cosy location.
Great steakhouse. The food was fantastic, and the service quite good.
Always a good steak. Staff was extremely nice this time.
Frankly more I like steak and cheesecake The rest is very normal Tastes in the latter

It was a good experience. Although afterwards I realized that the prices online were not updated. I and my family to celebrate my birthdays here. There are amazing foods and great service. Ms. Dianna who is the waitress was nice and friendly staff. I highly recommend Mark Joseph Steakhouse .

The food and service were phenomenal.   My daughter and I had dinner with one of my friends...started off with an excellent salad.  My daughter and I had a Porterhouse steak for 2, cooked perfectly.  My friend had seared tuna, also cooked perfectly.  We had three sides, mushrooms, asparagus and steak fries, all extremely tasty.  Finished up with cheesecake with berries and whip cream...definitely going back!!!
Perfect.  Nothing else to say !

Ribs are one of my favorite foods. This place is outstanding. Perfect portions that leave room for dessert.
Superb prime steaks. YUM!
On the expensive side. Food was good, I like my steak a bit more well seasoned. Hash browns were crispy. Dessert was apple crumb, but on small portion  side.
Good meat...! Seemed a bit empty for a Saturday, but that’s expected since it’s a weekday Corp crowd place. A bit dated for my taste, but a good vibe.
Awesome

The bartender Mike is great. He is very friendly and helpful. Made many good recommendations for food. Also, great dirty martinis 🙏🏻 their fries are delicious and the steak sandwich which you can only order at the bar or lunch is fantastic. Also, I recommend the thick cut Canadian bacon. So good

If I could give them 0 stars I would Nothing to go there those people doesn’t care from their customers very bad service  Your comment says invalid? Disrespectful!!! As a business should give a better service for your clients and my review says it all.
Great every time

very good steak itself! Dry aged-juicy and tender. a bit burned on the surface though. lobster bisque is average
It is authentic place, in the center, but quiet. Steaks were great. Must visit in NY.

Sat at the bar.  Good deals there

The most recent NYC Restaurant Week lunch was a great deal, even if it didn't include an appetizer and dessert.  I got the sirloin and it was great.  Pair that with the $8 house wine and you're all set.  The waitstaff was fantastic and friendly.  Would highly recommend even without the deal, been here a few times and the food has never disappointed.
Good food, great atmosphere and service!
Great classic steakhouse. Delicious apps and mouth watering steak.
Great food & service
Went for restaurant week. Baked clams, sirloin and sunday. Everything was delicious. Waiter was ver attentive. and nice. Very nice space.
The lunch menu is excellent and enough for one person (ask for more bread and butter!). Great service too.
(Translated by Google) Cozy atmosphere interior  (Original) 아늑한 분위기의 인테리어

Such excellent food! I came for restaurant week and ordered off that menu; I had the Caesar, sirloin, and berries and cream. Everything was on point and just simply amazing. Definitely one of the best meals I've had in a long time.
I regularly come by buying some food in this place. I love the prompt customer service and well prepared dishes. Keep it up.
great sirloin and wine list

We couple had Peter Luger just last month. MarkJoseph here is also great at dry age steaks, has great bacon strip, and wonderful service and atmosphere. Today we had restaurant week lunch choices of sirloin 14oz and filet 8oz. Both great and we shared both tastes. Of course median rare.
You cant beat MJs for a high quality steak. They staff always takes great care of you. Special shout out to my guys Ray and Tito.

I've had better. In fact, much better. For what they charge I expected much more. The food was only fair. The waitstaff was very friendly and accommodating. However the steaks were under done, the seafood was over done, and the servers made several mistakes, spilling drinks on the table and not coming to the table to check on us for a long, long while. For $150/person I just expected more.

The Porterhouse is a massive slab of steak perfection served on a sizzling hot platter infused with metal. The server slices the filet and strip equally and it comes with a spoon to scoop up the juices. The steak was some of the best I've ever had. The meat melts in your mouth in an abundance of flavor. The filet mignon was ordered medium rare, and the steaks were perfectly charred on the outside and a perfect temp on the inside. Overall, the experience was outstanding from the amazing food and wine, to the exceptional service. If you live in, or are visiting Manhattan, it is worth a trip down to the South Street Seaport for dinner at Mark Joseph Steakhouse.

Had a fantastic time at the bar, chatting with the bartender, Mike, and with the other patrons. This restaurant has a great neighborhood feel to it, despite being right in lower Manhattan.  We started out with the scallops and spinach appetizer, which was fantastic, if slightly on the small side (something Mike helpfully mentioned, before we even considered asking). The seasoning and sear on the scallops was superb, and shows a chef with great control of their cook surfaces.  My first clue that this place was special came when I ordered my steak rare, and they asked me how rare I wanted it. What's even better is that the resulting steak was a perfect match to my request.  The steak was perfect. Flavorful and melt-in-your-mouth tender, with a nice thin sear line. I have had a lot of good steaks, but this was easily the best meal of my life.  The house steak sauce is a sweet variant, that seems like it would make an excellent glaze for chicken, but using it on a steak this good would be blasphemous. They should license it to more mediocre steakhouses.  The overall atmosphere, service, and food easily justified the check at the end. We spent around 3 hours in the restaurant, split a nice bottle of wine, and had a very thorough dinner for two, with leftovers, and spent $250, including tip.  Normally I would be shocked by that amount, but instead, I'm thinking of going back this Friday for seconds.
Great service great food!!
They serve big dishes and for affordable prices. super nice owner. Kudos.

Honestly one of my favorite steakhouses in NYC - a gem hidden away - private - very pro staffed - with the most succulent cuts of beef. Over the years - it's like a family now. Always greeted with smiles hugs and above and beyond the average restaurant. I always look forward to going - and if you check my instagram - you'll find some AMAZING pictures of all the steaks!
The staff impressed with their high professionalism. The meat was a bit dry, but tasty. Really liked porc with jalapeno. I would recommend this place.

I must say....a truly satisfying dining experience. The service is warm and welcoming. I get the feeling that the staff knows their diners well. Cocktails are pretty good and the scotch and wine selection even better. Decor is dated but it reminds me of Christmas....it feels like your sitting in the living room of every one of your favorite 80’s and 90’s Christmas movies and I love it. Now the food.....love or hate this place the food is amazing! The scallops are cooked so perfectly, the seafood platter is amazing, the steaks are cooked perfectly. I just have no complaints about this place.
Amazing food!
I love this place and the staff as well
My family and I love the place! The steak was perfect, and the desserts are to die for! The pistachio ice cream actually tasted like pistachio! Amazing wait staff and nice owner too!

I live in the neighborhood and have been going here for over 10 years. This is one of the best, if not the best, steakhouses in NYC!  The staff has always been top-notch & the food is amazing.  Whether sitting at the bar or in the dining room, you get a consistent 5-star dining experience.
Great steak house.  Not necessarily a beautiful  decor but great selection of wines and beers and nice staff
Wait staff was excellent. has clams casino crab cakes and fried oysters to start. very good. I had the tomahawk steak. while cooked to the way I like it. overall taste was good. I have had better.
Service and food excellent
Amazing, wonderful service.
I used to enjoy going there for their steak. It's  not the same anymore. The service there is great but the food does not taste as great. Im wondering if they have a new chef.
Excellent food, excellent service!

Arrived with a large group and our orders were consistantly overcooked. I visited previously with one other person and the food was well prepared. Therefore, I don't recommend bringing more than a few people.
Great service, great food, AWESOME steak sauce...Yum.
Very good food. I love it.
Great Steak Sandwich & Salmon with cream spinach. Topped off with pecan pie was WONDERFUL MEAL
My favorite steakhouse in NYC. Peter Luger style t-bones in a classic steakhouse ambiance. Get the bacon and pour on the steak sauce.
It's got it's own vibe and the food is good, just not on par with other top steakhouses around the country such as Jeff Ruby's in Cincy.
Very good but expensive and worth it.

I really like this place. My mom and I go everytime shes in NYC and we get a steak and fresh lobster. They did bring out the lobster last time before it was cooked (still alive) which wasnt my favorite but other than that... the service is always 5 star and food is always delicious

Wonderful steakhouse done in a rustic style. We came during Restaurant Week, so we had a nice set meal (great selection for restaurant week). The steak was buttery and tender, the sides were flavorful and decent portioned. The steak tartare wasn’t amazing, it was a bit bland. The lobster bisque was creamy and had a nice seafood flavor. Overall, it was a great experience and would love to come again. Service was nice and friendly!  They seat only when your party is completely here, so make sure everyone is on time.

Marc Joseph’s Steakhouse is one of the best steakhouses I’ve EVER been too. Yea sure, prices are high, but it’s totally worth it. You name it, seafood, sides and even the steak alone is the best and most savory food they can offer. 10/10, 5 stars, would recommend.

My husband and I visited Mark Joseph Steakhouse as part of our honeymoon celebratory trip to NYC, and we loved the place!! It was a little far from the Fulton subway (10-15 mins) but it was definitely worth it!!  Made a reservation earlier that day and was shown to our table very promptly upon arrival. We had a cosy corner and was served by a brilliant friendly waiter (sorry I didn’t catch his name but he wore glasses, was quite tall and imlooks middle-aged). He was very professional the whole night, he recommended to pair our fillet mignons with the hash potatoes and asparagus and omg, the potatoes were heavenly!! He even described the sizes of the mignons perfectly. The fillets were cooked nicely too, although the MR for my husband could have been a tad more cooked but we finished everything, had to pack the potatoes as they were a big portion. Do note that the 16oz is quite huge!!  Had a pistachio ice cream for dessert since we were stuffed and that was absolutely delicious too. In all honesty, the quality of the food, service and overall ambience of the place justified the price and we were extremely satisfied.  We will be back here whenever we visit NYC again! Highly recommended :)

username: Martíngarcia sonido Madison usa canal oficial

caption: Very excellent steaks and lamb chops. Wonderful service .. slightly dry humor, and the best care.
One of the best

Met a few friends for dinner. Nice beer selection.  We ordered a variety of apps, all were excellent. Steaks cooked to perfection and good sides. I would highly recommend a meal here. The servers were all top shelf too.
Good steak, good service. Always have a seat for me.
Small but awesome spot.  Very clean and comfortable. Pablo made the rest of the team made the visit very memorable. This was a last minute choice for my friend birthday and it was awesome.

This place blew me away! The food was amazing!!!!!!! The service was exceptional, we all felt like royalty!!!! If I could give more then 5 stars I would!!!!!! I honestly have to say this has been the best steakhouse I have ever been too!!!!
Excellent

One of the two best steak restaurants in the area. Always is packed. Have to make a reservation and sometimes you have to wait at the bar. But the food and the service are worth it. It is not inexpensive and they have a really good selection of wines.

Atmosphere was nice.  Waiter very attentive and accommodating.  Didn't like how any of the meat was cooked.  Lamb, sirloins, filets were all seared to burnt on the outside and red raw, almost purple inside.  We all ordered Medium to MR.  Meat was rushed.  Cooked to fast.  Everything else was great.  6 people all had meat entrees that were poorly prepared.  Waiter wanted to take everything back and recook it but it was soo overdone on the outside, cooking more would have made it worse.
Delicious food and prompt, friendly service.

A bit crowded during restaurant week, but the food was delicious! The steak was delicious - they pre cut the sirloin before serving. I ordered mine medium rare and my husband ordered his rare and it was nice to see they got the difference right!  Also got the bacon for an appetizer and it was really good.

Came here with the wife for Restuarant Week. Had the baked clams, sirloin, and brownie sundae, all of which was delicious. Customer service was courteous and responsive. We are definitely planning on coming back here in the near future.

This is the 3rd restaurant week that I've celebrated at MarkJoseph. Yes, it's close to my office, however I keep coming back for the delicious food. The 8oz. Filet was cooked to my liking, flavored nicely served with a small side of mashed potatoes. Salad and dessert were also delicious. Appreciated the attentive service, however lunch took closer to 90 minutes, my only complaint!
nice staff and steak, outdated decor..

I've been here a number of times and it has always been above excellent. This is the only place that cooks my steak perfectly every time. But the last time was not as good. My steak was not cooked the way I wanted and I don't like sending it back. I asked for pink in the middle of my steak and it was red and I couldn't finish it. I found out after we left that my brothers steak was not cooked the way he wanted but he didn't want to send it back either. He never ate there before and I told him he wouldn't be disappointed. I felt embarrassed. The service was second to none. I now need to find another steakhouse that can cook a steak as requested. A month went by and no response to my review. I will not be going back to this establishment with my family or my friends. Went to another steakhouse with my friends the other day. The steak was cooked as requested and it was one third the price and it was delicious. The service was not as good but satisfactory. The important thing was the steak was cooked as requested. No response from the owner at all. He or she should respond to all the reviews regardless if it's good or bad. Honestly, I was hoping for an apology for the incorrect way my steak was cooked. Oh well, I guess they have more important things to do than respond to a customers negative review. Been going there for years with my friends. Never again.

Let me start by saying positive things, the staff is quick friendly and accommodating. The steak i had (cowboy ribeye) was good but certainly not the best. The place looks a bit “past it’s prime”, with the curtains hanging half off. I won’t be back but at the same time I did not have a bad experience, its just that for for the  money that you pay you can have a lot better somewhere else.

My wife and I have been patronizing MarkJoseph for over 5 years now and they never disappoint. The food is great and the staff is welcoming and attentive. The ambiance is what enhances the experience. They're signature steak sauce is a winner. I order a couple of bottles per visit.
Do NOT forget to order the bacon!!!

Terrible experience! Our waitress was extremely strange, and did not check on us after the food was brought to our table. My husband ordered surf & turf medium well. His steak was burnt on the outside & rare inside. The lobster was disgusting... we waited forever for our tab. Multiple employees noticed we were not happy & they all just stared or spoke amongst each other, never asking if there was anything they could do for us. So sad we chose this place over our other options.
Outstanding
One of the best steakhouses in NYC. Friendly and knowledgable staff.  Great for groups, romantic dates and lunch!
Great food, great service, and a great atmosphere

The worst customer experience I have ever had in a restaurant and especially a steakhouse in NYC. I can honestly say I believe I was discriminated against because I was not a native New Yorker. I have eaten at all the major steakhouses in NYC and the bar service was seriously rude at this place. Will never eat there again and will tell all about the rude experience.
Amazing celebration dinner with my family.  We love Mark Joseph's steak and seafood.
Outstanding value , perfectly cooked Tomahawk ribeye , slow service.
Nice and quiet steakhouse.  Service is great too

It's a nice place, great food and great staff. But its overpriced. The steak was not the experience I'd pay +$50 a plate for again. The flavor was muted, where as I'd expect an umph from a +30 day dry aged steak.

Top rated NY steakhouse doesn't disappoint.  Come here hungry.  For starters try the bacon or lobster bisque.  The porterhouse for two or the branzino are excellent entree selections.  A top notch wine selection compliments.  Attentive service.  Liverly (on the loud side) atmosphere.  Not stuffy.  Just good food and a great night out.
Porterhouse was awesome

Excellent NY Steakhouse experience. Pricey for sure, and the proximity to the financial district guarantees that there will be at least a couple of capitalist fat-cats about. But all the food was delicious and our server was great.
Great steaks and good value during restaurant week. I'd suggest trying the bacon, I liked it better than the steak.
Always excellent

Service was absolutely top notch. Main course was disappointing given the price point.  Filet mignon was tough and the lobster tail was rubbery and not very sweet.   The side dishes, appetizers, and dessert were good, though.
Old school steakhouse with excellent waiters and top quality dry aged beef.
Amazing porterhouse!
Great steak
This place is AMAZINGGGGG I dont Normally enjoy restaurant food but you will be in heaven..
Phenomenal food and service!

Not impressed here, the price point of all the entrees and with it being a steakhouse I'm completely disappointed they can't cook a steak or lamb chops. Medium rare and it came out a little past raw, and the meat wasn't even hot. Oh wait they got decent asparagus- wait it's a steakhouse.
Great food and service. Hostess was very kind.
Phenomenal steaks and service, never too greasy or too much. You'll actually have room for going out and having drinks after unlike most other places that pile on the butter and 'itis'.
Great place
Amazing steak!  Tomahawk was huge and filet was perfect.  Great wine list and upscale environment!
Good steak and generous portion
Classic steakhouse. Excellent service.
(Translated by Google) It's a very standard steakhouse, very tasty and has a nice atmosphere.  (Original) とてもスタンダードなステーキハウスでとても美味しく、雰囲気も良いお店です。
Amazing steak
Very nice place, good food a little on the pricy side but not to bad
Food very good. Waiter dismissive of me and friend. Busboys were excellent.
Outstanding sirloin!
One of the best steakhouse in nyc hands down. Ask for Mike to be your waiter. Hes simply amazing.
(Translated by Google) It is a very quiet place  (Original) Es un lugar muy tranquilo
Good food. Very helpful wait staff.
Real!
Everything is great.  French onion soup, steak, tuna, everything is in point.

I can honestly say that this is one of the best steak houses that exhists. I have been there over 20 times and I get excited every time I go. I lived at 10 Hanover square Several years ago after moving from mid town and My Wife and I stumbled upon this gem by accident. It was superb. Our waiter was Marty and he made the experience exceptional. The Bscon appetizer is to die for and the steak is absolutely fantastic. We always get the porter house for two with the amazing seafood tower. The staff always makes you feel at home and we have seen so many repeat customers who are always thrilled to be here as well. If you have tried the other steak houses in the city like Bobby Van’s and Wolfgang’s you will taste the superior difference immediately. The Owner Ray always comes out to say Hello And he really wants you to have a beyond excellent experience. So go here and see for yourself how a truly amazing steak House should be
Great steak!

We are on our first visit to NYC and in-laws brought us down to Seaport Village for dinner and shopping.  Much to our chagrin the area at pier 17 was closed for remodeling and construction.  Asked a few of the locals for a place and consulted Google maps and found a place that we wasn't really what we were looking for.  The waitress there recommended Mark Joseph's and after going down a block too far and getting new directions we found it.  I immediately thought it was like something you see in a NYC movie.  The service from our waiter was amazing and the food was equally as good.  Our appetizers were all amazing, steaks perfectly cooked, and the sea bass was equally as tasty.  Had the Mark Joseph special for dessert....awesome.  Wish they would've maybe had a local small brew beer available but the Sam Adams Summer Ale was really good.  If you live in the area and haven't tried it you're missing out and if you are visiting look them up.
Best steakhouse in FIDI
There are definitely better steakhouses! More than acceptable quality but I wouldn't run back there.....its no Lugers!
One Of the Best if not the Best...
Great food
Great place to eat on the $$$.. Food was on point..
Great food. Suzzanne is charming
Great porterhouse!

Good service, good food. Was quiet intimate. Food was cooked exactly how I ordered it. If u like overseasoned good this is not the place for you They cook the food enough to maintain natural flavor. Had Filet mignon and asparagus very little seasoning but the food was fresh so it was perfect. Had the bacon and it was superb
Impeccable service, delicious food. Priced as you'd expect a Manhattan Steakhouse to be.
Very good, excellent service.  Not a good place for those of us on a budget or on a diet, but was totally worth it!
Possibly my favorite steakhouse in the city. Killer food, very friendly staff, and a super old school feel. Classic NY steakhouse. Also, great sports photos near the restrooms.
it's okay. a bit overrated. the steak i had wasn't anything that special, especially for that price.

My wife, daughter, and I enjoyed everything about Mark Joseph Steakhouse.  The staff were wonderful, the place is a great combination of classy and comfortable.  All of the food (roasted chicken for my daughter, surf and turf for me, mussels for my wife with sides of mashed potatoes and spinach) was delicious. I look forward to an opportunity to go here again.
Excellent food but is a bit pricey in my opinion.
Excellent
Delicious

Had a great experience, went there with a couple of friends to celebrate a new job.  Our server was very knowledgeable, she helped us order just the right amount of food.  We ended up ordering the porterhouse for three and a 50oz tomahawk as our mains.  We started with bacon strips and a few sides.  The whole staff were friendly and attentive.  Great experience will definitely be coming back.
Still a fantastic steakhouse with typical pricing. Great value during restaurant week as well

OK so I  tried this restaurant at the request of a co worker, who like myself enjoys a good steak. Well he didn't lie the steak was great and the canadian bacon appetizer was sinful. The service was great and when I couldnt decide between two desserts the waitress bought both and said one was on the house. Who wouldnt love that?
Service was on point. Server had great knowledge of the menu. Friendly. Nice atmosphere. Reasonable prices and very good portions. Will go back.
Had the T-bone , one of the BEST steaks I've ever had.
Received the full steakhouse treatment even on a Restaurant Week lunch.

I had a rare Cowboy ribeye.  It's exactly what you expect, a huge hunk of premium meat.  The bone was great.  It's very lightly seasoned which is good for us who have to watch our spice intake.  It had a charred flavor; a good sear.  If you're looking for more flavor there's a premium ribeye option, but we didn't have that at our table.  Service was the best in the city.
Great food and service, staff was great but tables need to be larger for service and environment is a tad old and could use a  refresh. Still a great meal and a great night out.    Recommended highly
Wow. What a steak and oysters Rockefeller
A little bit out of the way, however the food and service are outstanding.  I would definitely recommend the thick cut bacon as an appetizer!
The food is delicious.  Cooked to perfection. A definite must try. Waiter was very knowledgeable. Great dining experience.

Went there for restaurant week for lunch. Had the 14oz sirloin which was cooked perfectly medium rare. The mash potatoes were delicious and service was excellent. I would absolutely eat here again. A good place to grab lunch or dinner if your near South Street Seaport.
The interior is a bit dated but the filet mignon was perfectly cooked and the service was friendly and efficient. Better than many of the bigger name steakhouses in NYC.
Fantastic steakhouse. Such a gem in NYC.
Great restaurant.  The food is excellent.
Great place, quiet, you can get in, and great food
You'll become a steak snob after eating here. Yes the food and service are exceptional.
Phenomenal experience. First class service. Our servers were beyond expectations.
Cosy place, adequate portions and offerings. Nothing above expectations. Don't go here to have a stand-out experience either dining, wine selections or food quality.
Best steak in New York
Great food and atmosphere, definitely worth the price.
Excellent food and service.  Steak the way you like it.
Always great and affordable steaks with great service
Solid food at a reasonable price. Server was great. Forgot to get his name but he was stellar.
The food is great. The steaks are prime.  The whole staff is great.

Came in yesterday and came across this steak house last night with my friend . I had the lamb chops and lobster mac. My friend ordered the sirloin and broccoli . Table next to us ordered lobster that just looked so tasty to my taste buds so we ordered the lobster as well . Everything was phenomenal ! So tasty and good . Ray the owner really knows how to hold the standard high . Thank You .

Pros: relatively easy to get reservations. Service was competent. Broccoli rabe app was delicious. Bread was delicious. Nice thick cut.  Cons: the filet mignon that I had had too much asymmetrical grey banding for a top caliber steakhouse. This is a serious transgression. Undoubtedly a result of too much time in the broiler. Limited selection of steak cuts. Steak did not appear to have been aged for long.  Summary: there are a lot of other options in the area that do a better job on meat.
Huge portion and delectable options! I had the fillet with grilled shrimp and mushroom. So yum and tender and the grilled shrimp were excellent. Love it!
They should be embarrassed to call themselves a Steak House.
The food is delicious!

Very good
(Translated by Google) Wow food ....  (Original) La nourriture wow....

I wasn't sure what to expect,  since the businesss sidewalk cafe area only has a view of the building next to it and on the inside it is made to look like a cozy space that doesn't benefit from windows.  The perfect place to have a business meeting,  which I'm sure,  due to location,  many do. H  I went during the lunch hour and benefitted from the extensive lunch menu, which had almost all of the features from the main menu and the side dishes at lower cost.  I was gracefully serviced by a seasoned blonde female server , Cathy,  who knew exactly how much bothering was a bother.  I imagine she has eaten in many a nice venue and tailored her service to a level she would wish to receive. And she was assisted by a debonair Hispanic service person who brought the , a garlic onion brown roll and  , which I believed was filtered.  If you go during lunch hour,  you can dress casually and be sure to utilize this tool to try a few things as it proved invaluable for me and resulted in me visiting a few more times with friends for dinner. And I knew what to get.  Every time has been a pleasure and I look forward to going again.

Went in a couple days ago and was greeted by all we came in contact with. Diana was our server and she did a great job. She was very knowledgeable and attentive. Steak and mashed potatoes were delicious. Service was awesome. Keep up the great work.
Great food and great service.
Beautiful steak salad
lovely ambience,  porterhouse steak was soft and delicious and the halibut also was rich and meaty. We also had the canadian bacon... yum!Our irish server suzy was excellent too.
Nice
This is one of my favorite restaurants.  We came during Restaurant Week and we ordered from the RW menu.  Food and service are good and the portion is big.  It's very good deal !
Very good steakhouse. Fried oysters very good and a great spicy sauce. Bone in sirloin cooked to perfection. Sorbet very good. Perfect attentive and friendly service.
Nice place for dinner.
Love this place!!!
Excellent steakhouse. The thick cut Canadian bacon was exceptional, and my Filet was cooked perfectly. I enjoyed the ambiance and felt very comfortable dining there.
Great steak
Service and food was incredible
Classic NYC steakhouse. Awesome
One of the best steak houses in NYC! Perfect serving, cozy environment!
